document.id: Lac Courte Oreilles Tribal Governing Board Res. No. 2022-116
document.codify:doc: Lac Courte Oreilles Tribal Code of Law
document.heading: Amendments to Lac Courte Oreilles Tribal Court Code GNC.4.11 Animal Control Ordinance

recital.text: the Lac Courte Oreilles Band of Lake Superior Chippewa Indians is a federally recognized Indian tribe ("Tribe") organized pursuant to the provisions of the Indian Reorganization Act of 1934, 25 U.S.C. §5101, et seq.; and,

the Tribal Governing Board serves as the governing body of Lac Courte Oreilles Band of Lake Superior Chippewa Indians pursuant to Article III, § 1 of the Amended Constitution and Bylaws of the Lac Courte Oreilles Band of Lake Superior Chippewa Indians;
WHEREAS, the Tribal Governing Board possesses the inherent sovereign authority to regulate its territory; and

pursuant to Article V, Section 1(s) of the Amended Constitution and Bylaws of the Lac Courte Oreilles Band of Lake Superior Chippewa Indians, empowers the Tribal Governing Board to “promulgate and enforce ordinances governing the conduct of members of the Lac Courte Oreilles Band of Lake Superior Chippewa Indians of Wisconsin and providing for the maintenance of law and order and the administration of justice by establishing a tribal court and defining its duties and powers;” and
the Tribal Governing Board may regulate and impose obligations upon all owners and keepers of animals, in order to protect the safety and welfare of all persons and animals.
that the Tribal Governing Board hereby amends Chapter GNC.4 Animal Control Ordinance as follows:

cite.doc: Lac Courte Oreilles Tribal Code of Law
Lac Courte Oreilles Tribal Code of Law

recital.text: (f) “department” means the LCO Police Department and or the LCO Conservation Department;

codify:find-replace.codified:doc: Lac Courte Oreilles Tribal Code of Law
codify:find-replace.replace: “department” means the LCO Police Department and or the LCO Conservation Department;

cite.doc: Lac Courte Oreilles Tribal Code of Law

recital.text: (b) The licensing fee shall be Twenty and 00/100 Dollars ($20.00) for each one (1) year period. The fee shall be Five and 00/100 Dollars ($5.00) for any dog or cat if the owner or keeper presents written proof that the animal has been neutered or spayed.

cite.doc: Lac Courte Oreilles Tribal Code of Law

recital.text: (b) The licensing fee shall be Twenty and 00/100 Dollars ($20.00) for each one (1) year period. The fee shall be Ten and 00/100 Dollars ($10.00) for any dog or cat if the owner or keeper presents written proof that the animal has been neutered or spayed.

codify:find-replace.codified:doc: Lac Courte Oreilles Tribal Code of Law
codify:find-replace.find: The licensing fee shall be Twenty and 00/100 Dollars ($20.00) for each one (1) year period. The fee shall be Five and 00/100 Dollars ($5.00) for any dog or cat if the owner or keeper presents written proof that the animal has been neutered or spayed.
codify:find-replace.replace: The licensing fee shall be Twenty and 00/100 Dollars ($20.00) for each one (1) year period. The fee shall be Ten and 00/100 Dollars ($10.00) for any dog or cat if the owner or keeper presents written proof that the animal has been neutered or spayed.

procedural-data.text: I, the undersigned, as Secretary/Treasurer of the Lac Courte Oreilles Tribal Governing Board, hereby certify that the Tribal Governing Board is composed of seven (7) members, of whom 5 being present, constituted a quorum at a meeting thereof, duly called, convened, and held on this 21st day of November 2022, that the foregoing Resolution was duly adopted at said meeting by an affirmative vote of 4 members, 0 against, 0 abstaining, and that said Resolution is a lawful act of the Tribe.
Lac Courte Oreilles Tribal Governing Board
